00040 {
00041         typedef struct _EncodingDescription
00042         {
00043                 const char * szName;
00044                 char   bSmart; // is it a smart codec ?
00045                 char   bSendUtf8; // does it send utf8 or the local charset ?
00046                 const char * szDescription;
00047         } EncodingDescription;
00048 
00049         // you MUST start iterating from 0 and terminate when
00050         // you get an entry with a NULL szName

00064 // not exported
00065 class KviTranslationEntry
00066 {
00067 public:
00068         KviStr    m_szKey;
00069         KviStr    m_szEncodedTranslation;
00070         QString * m_pQTranslation;
00071 public:
00072         KviTranslationEntry(char * keyptr,int keylen,char * trptr,int trlen)
00073         : m_szKey(keyptr,keylen) , m_szEncodedTranslation(trptr,trlen)
00074         {
00075                 m_pQTranslation = 0;
00076         }
00077 
00078         KviTranslationEntry(const char * keyandtr)
00079         : m_szKey(keyandtr) , m_szEncodedTranslation(keyandtr)
00080         {
00081                 m_pQTranslation = 0;
00082         }
00083 
00084         ~KviTranslationEntry()
00085         {
00086                 if(m_pQTranslation)delete m_pQTranslation;
00087         }
00088 };

00110 #define __tr(__text__) g_pMainCatalogue->translate(__text__)
00111 #define __tr_no_lookup(__text__) __text__
00112 #define __tr_no_xgettext(__text__) g_pMainCatalogue->translate(__text__)
00113

00115 #define __tr2qs_no_xgettext(__text__) g_pMainCatalogue->translateToQString(__text__)
